# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8.8 FATAL_ERROR)
SET(VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR "/curc/tools/x_86_64/rh6/visit/2.6.2/2.6.2/linux-x86_64/include")
SET(VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR "/curc/tools/x_86_64/rh6/visit/2.6.2/2.6.2/linux-x86_64/lib")
SET(VISIT_BINARY_DIR "/curc/tools/x_86_64/rh6/visit/2.6.2/2.6.2/linux-x86_64/bin")
SET(VISIT_ARCHIVE_DIR "/curc/tools/x_86_64/rh6/visit/2.6.2/2.6.2/linux-x86_64/archives")
SET(VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR "/home/life9360/.visit/2.6.2/linux-x86_64/plugins")
INCLUDE("/curc/tools/x_86_64/rh6/visit/2.6.2/2.6.2/linux-x86_64/include/PluginVsInstall.cmake")
INCLUDE("/curc/tools/x_86_64/rh6/visit/2.6.2/2.6.2/linux-x86_64/include/VisItLibraryDependencies.cmake")

PROJECT(sw4img)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
sw4imgPluginInfo.C
sw4imgCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
sw4imgPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
sw4imgMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtsw4imgFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
sw4imgEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtsw4imgFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
)


LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} )

ADD_LIBRARY(Isw4imgDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Isw4imgDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS Isw4imgDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(Msw4imgDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES}    )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Msw4imgDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(Msw4imgDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} Msw4imgDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(Esw4imgDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Esw4imgDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(Esw4imgDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} Esw4imgDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(Esw4imgDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Esw4imgDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(Esw4imgDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} Esw4imgDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
